feed.title: Fort St. John - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Fort St. John
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 4:33 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -19.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -21.6°C
Wind: NW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 27 December 2022
